mapper.select: SELECT H3.SEQ_NO, H3.USER_ID, H3.PSWD, H3.FLNM, H3.PHN_NO, H3.DEPART, H3.AUTH_DVCD, H6.NAME FROM HMFB_003 H3 LEFT JOIN HMFB_006 H6 ON H6.CODE_GRP = 'AUTH_DVCD' AND H6.UZ_YN = 'Y' AND H6.CODE = H3.AUTH_DVCD WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND DEL_YN = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HMFB_003 ( SEQ_NO, USER_ID, PSWD, FLNM, PHN_NO, DEPART, AUTH_DVCD, DEL_YN, REG_DT, REG_TM ) VALUES( #{seqNo}, #{userId}, #{pswd}, #{flnm}, #{phnNo}, #{depart}, #{authDvcd}, 'N', #{regDt}, #{regTm} )
mapper.select: WITH AUTH_MENU AS ( SELECT MENU_SEQ_NO, AUTH_DVCD FROM HMFB_001 WHERE AUTH_DVCD = #{authDvcd} ) SELECT CASE WHEN H2.LVL = '2' THEN AM.AUTH_DVCD ELSE NULL END AS AUTH_DVCD, H2.SEQ_NO, H2.UPRN_SEQ_NO, H2.FLNM, H2.URL, H2.LVL, H2.ODR, H2.UZ_YN FROM HMFB_002 H2 LEFT OUTER JOIN AUTH_MENU AM ON H2.SEQ_NO = AM.MENU_SEQ_NO WHERE H2.UZ_YN = 'Y'
